name: Hashing / Frequency
description: Count occurrences with a hash map to answer membership and frequency queries fast.

overview.what: Build a frequency map from elements to counts using an object or Map.
overview.when: Use when you need to detect duplicates or count items quickly with O(1) lookups.

detect: You need fast membership/frequency checks; duplicates or counts matter more than order.
mistakes: Using array.indexOf in loops instead of a hash map
Not initializing missing keys to 0 before increment
Forgetting that object keys stringify; use Map for non-string keys
tips: Use Map for numeric keys; default with (get(key) || 0) + 1. Hashing shines when order isn’t critical.
